con:resource.name: login
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to authentificate in the application and retrieve account data

con:resource.name: getCards
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to get a list of cards

con:resource.name: getCardTrans
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to get card transactions

con:resource.name: updateCard
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to update a card status

con:resource.name: getLocation
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to get a list of branch, atm and agents from a geographic coordinates

con:resource.name: getLoyaltyPoint
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to get their loyalty point

con:resource.name: topUpCard
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to top up a card

con:resource.name: getMySecretQuestion
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to get questions list to register

con:resource.name: forgotUserName
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to regenerate a username

con:resource.name: updateCustomerAgent
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to update customer and agent informations

con:resource.name: changePassword
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to change the password

con:resource.name: forgotPassword
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to regenerate a new password

con:resource.name: changeRegisPIN
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to change the registration PIN used by a user

con:resource.name: forgotRegisPin
con:resource.con:description: this service allows users to regenerate the registration PIN used by a user
